Author: srina114
Text: i've been trying to get electrolytes from gatorade and powerade after/during my workouts. i have had a little bit of brain fog the past couple days, so today i had some grapes and a granola bar. i'm still going to go on, maybe just not as intense.  thanks for telling me about your experience :))

Author: Azaryxe
Text: I did for 12 days. I felt like death towards the end. Lost the a bit more than when I did it for 5/6 days, so it wasn't really worth feeling that terrible for. I was also working 16 hours a week in very physical job, and I noticed I got significantly weaker, to the point it took way too much effort just to climb the stairs.  I don't recommend going so long, especially if you start feeling negative effects, which for me were dizziness, fatigue, brain fog and weakness. But I also wasn't replenishing any lost electrolytes, so make sure you do, particularly magnesium and potassium.
